title: Sounds for Android Wear
summary: Wear Sounds for Android Wear.An amazing soundboard for your Android Watch.
description: Transform your Android Watch into a remote Soundboard by selecting amazing sound and playing them onto your Phone.You can also change the volume, it's very easy, the app is free and yours immediately.You can also play the sounds from your phone :)Have fun by playing Sound remotely from your watch on your phone speaker. There is a lot of different sound like: cat, dog, chicken, fart, burp...
descriptionHTML:
Transform your Android Watch into a remote Soundboard by selecting amazing sound and playing them onto your Phone.

You can also change the volume, it's very easy, the app is free and yours immediately.

You can also play the sounds from your phone :)

Have fun by playing Sound remotely from your watch on your phone speaker.
There is a lot of different sound like: cat, dog, chicken, fart, burp...
comments: Why cant we buy a full ad free version? Loud Ads boiled the joke. :(
Waiting for ability to manage the sounds
